Attributes.description: Analytical, computational, and experimental methods in fluid mechanics. Overview of CFD program development. Finite volume methods, spacial discretization and spatial accuracy analysis. Boundary conditions. Time advance methods, time accuracy, and stability. Application to model problems and to the incompressible laminar Navier-Stokes equations. Validation techniques for CFD codes.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon, Start Time: 13:00, End Time: 14:00, Building: MacMillan, Room: 158
